programmes.show_description: Richard Latto presents alternative anthems from a music community with attitude.
City girls Pamela and Jacki tour Devon and Cornwall, where they meet Bridget and Angela, devoted nudists who open their eyes to true freedom.
Songs, sketches, stand-up, celebrity guests, and an all-out assault on the nation's funny-bone, starring cheeky Cockney Brian Conley.
Alex Dyke learns about another popular car from our past when he visits the National Motor Museum at Beaulieu.
Music
It is Courtesy Week at Thunderbird 3's depot and the binmen are out to improve their image.
Richard Latto presents alternative anthems from a music community with attitude.
Jack Hargreaves celebrates rural England, blending folklore, crafts, and gentle storytelling as Hargreaves explores vanishing traditions, landscapes, and the quiet wisdom of country life.
While Holmes and Watson are out of London on vacation, someone has taken the opportunity to impersonate Holmes - to a great profit.
After a famous criminal is run over and killed by a milk wagon, Lestrade finds a coded note in the man's clothing. He asks Holmes to decipher it.
Sir Charles Farnsworth is found dead in his mysterious Farnsworth Castle. He had a clause inserted in his will that his death must be investigated by Sherlock Holmes.

programmes.show_name: The Top Secret Life of Edgar Briggs
programmes.show_description: While redecorating, Briggs must oversee a spy exchange, confronting enemy agents armed only with a paintbrush tucked in his holster, turning a tense encounter into a comic standoff.

programmes.show_name: The Top Secret Life of Edgar Briggs
programmes.show_description: Briggs uncovers a pianist's plot to pass secrets to the KGB, ultimately stopping him-but only after an unexpected turn lands Briggs singing live on a radio broadcast.

programmes.show_name: The Top Secret Life of Edgar Briggs
programmes.show_description: Briggs suspects clerk Edwards of treachery and uncovers a spy network but his bungled approach sees him accidentally arresting two innocent men along the way.
Mr Bowler likes Craven for his style and wants Duffy on his payroll too. Duffy refuses, but Bowler is determined and believes anyone can be persuaded to change their mind.
Craven moves out and gets a flat he sees as a perfect seduction pad. After giving a lift to a heavily pregnant hitch-hiker, his love nest starts to look more like a nursing home.
Sharon has been Eric Duffys girlfriend since school and fears thats all shell ever be. She takes drastic action, while Eric finally takes one step though its a big one.
Eric is so captivated by a girl at the bus stop that he misses his bus and is late for work, right when Bloody Delilah is conducting a time-and-motion study on the Thunderbird 3 crew.
Cheese and Egg's mate has passed away, which makes him turn from his life of sin. The lads unsuccessfully try to tempt him back to his old ways.
Bloody Delilah waits for wedding RSVPs, but only the best man replies and he cant attend. With few options, Delilah invites the Thunderbird 3 crew to his stag party.
The Nemesis agents are sent to investigate murder and gun-running when a cache of wartime Japanese armaments is discovered in the Burmese jungle.
Ken and Margaret try to track down a missing husband who has absconded with the firm's money, and Harry employs cowboy electricians who leave the ballroom without electricity.

Liz in London tells Vivien her husband was executed as a spy. Vivien and Emily train with Colin and go to Southern France; Emily poses as Marie Ferrier's kin. Kit returns again, Liz meets him awkward.
Vivien, Emily, and Colin parachute into France; Colin injures his ankle. Vivien poses as nanny, Emily stays with Marie, raising suspicion. Colin kills a Milice woman. In England, Liz rejects Kit.
Vivien and Gordon hide the body, Colin flees to Spain. Liz, divorcing Laurence, volunteers to replace him and clashes with Kit. Vivien asks a priest to help find the daughter she gave up.
Mr Bowler likes Craven for his style and wants Duffy on his payroll too. Duffy refuses, but Bowler is determined and believes anyone can be persuaded to change their mind.
Craven moves out and gets a flat he sees as a perfect seduction pad. After giving a lift to a heavily pregnant hitch-hiker, his love nest starts to look more like a nursing home.
Nemesis agents find themselves programmed to kill their own colleagues and two of the Champions come to blows.

programmes.show_description: Briggs uncovers a pianist's plot to pass secrets to the KGB, ultimately stopping him-but only after an unexpected turn lands Briggs singing live on a radio broadcast.

Ken and Margaret try to track down a missing husband who has absconded with the firm's money, and Harry employs cowboy electricians who leave the ballroom without electricity.
Based on Jilly Coopers bestseller, lust and rivalry surround British equestrians. Superbly adapted for the small screen, it lifts the veil on show jumping with romance, adventure and indulgence.
An aged vampire uses seductive vampiric women posing as sex workers to lure men to his lair. When their commander vanishes, two macho Navy sailors fall into the deadly trap.
Richard Latto presents alternative anthems from a music community with attitude.
A woman seeking her father enters a seaside town ruled by a blood-weeping cult, uncovering a surreal nightmare as the dead stir and darkness spreads through a community lost to an ancient hunger.
Robert Kennedy convinces Loengard to testify before the Warren Commission; Bach puts the squeeze on J. Edgar Hoover to discredit Loengard.

programmes.show_name: The Prime of Miss Jean Brodie
programmes.show_description: Having fallen under the spell of their passionate, charismatic teacher, students Sandy and Jenny fuel their romantic fantasies with made-up stories.
Richard Latto presents alternative anthems from a music community with attitude.
Explore the cascades and ravines of the French Alps.
Explore the forests of Northern Thailand.
Francis Coudrill presents a unique blend of animation and the European Western in this TV classic as Hank Rides Again. 1/13
Francis Coudrill presents a unique blend of animation and the European Western in this TV classic as Hank Rides Again. 2/13
A condemned man scheduled to hang the next day uses his last request to ask Sherlock Holmes to prove his innocence of the murder for which he is about to be executed.
A political leader is being blackmailed, and to find the blackmailers, Holmes and Watson join a lonely hearts club. However, things don't go quite as planned.

programmes.show_name: The Top Secret Life of Edgar Briggs
programmes.show_description: Briggs, in disguise, is tasked with escorting a top Russian scientist. Attempting a shortcut to shake pursuers, he ends up hopelessly lost in a multi-storey car park.

programmes.show_name: The Top Secret Life of Edgar Briggs
programmes.show_description: Briggs investigates a leak at the Naval Section, uncovering secret missile plans hidden in a £5 note only to unwittingly hand it to the croupier as a tip during a game of roulette.
Frankie Abbott enjoys life on the dole, staying in bed and playing with his new camera. His mother meets private investigator Mr Drew and persuades him to re-employ Frankie.
When Dennis is persuaded to holiday by the sea, his father comes along for the cure. To the horror of elderly hotel residents, the sea air revives both father and son.
Alex Dyke presents an hour of bubblegum pop to make you feel good.
The binmen try to make some money on the side by putting items they have found in the rubbish up for sale in local auction rooms.
It is Courtesy Week at Thunderbird 3's depot and the binmen are out to improve their image.
That's My Dog, game show hosted by Derek Hobson where dogs and their owners compete for money and prizes.
Three agents of Nemesis are granted miraculous powers by a mysterious stranger when they crash-land their plane in Tibet.
An unscrupulous fast food supremo gets what he deserves for his maltreatment of young employees, and Harry organises an American pageant and square dance at the Plaza Suite.

programmes.show_name: The Prime of Miss Jean Brodie
programmes.show_description: Miss Brodie recruits the beautiful young Rose into her circle of favored students after learning that the girl has no mother at home.

programmes.show_name: The Prime of Miss Jean Brodie
programmes.show_description: The famous ballerina Anna Pavlova is coming to Edinburgh. Miss Brodie insists that her girls experience this important cultural event.
Big budget adaptation of Edward Bulwer-Lytton's epic, set against the eruption of Mount Vesuvius. Laurence Olivier and Lesley-Anne Down star in a 1984 miniseries about greed and decadence.

A writer and his girlfriend stumble into a graveyard ruled by the Dark Master, forced to witness eerie undead rituals that blur the line between horror, desire, and the bizarre.
